extension_description.message: Adds SteamDB links and new features on the Steam store and community. View lowest game prices and stats.
extension_description.description: This value can be up to 132 characters.

steamstatus_downtime.message: Steam appears to be experiencing some downtime.

view_on_steam_hunters.description: Steam Hunters is the name of https://steamhunters.com/ please do not translate it

store_page.description: This translation should match how Steam translates it on community hubs

app_steamdb_rating_tooltip.message: $positive$ of the $total$ reviews are positive (all purchase types)

app_lowest_price_discount.message: SteamDB lowest recorded price is $price$ at -$discount$%

app_lowest_price_limited.message: SteamDB lowest recorded price is $price$ and 2-year low is $price_limited$

app_lowest_date_multiple.description: This string is only used if $seen$ is higher than one, so it can not be 0 or 1.

agecheck_option_hint.message: SteamDB has an option to automatically skip these age check pages

explore_generating.message: Generating new discovery queue, this can fail if Steam is under high load‚Ä¶

explore_failed_to_clear_too_many.message: Failed to clear the queue too many times. You can try again later.

explore_saleitem_claim_description.message: Claim the free daily reward if there is one.

explore_saleitem_cant_claim.message: No daily reward to claim at this moment.

datetime.description: Date and time format depends on locale set in browser

explore_saleitem_claim_failed.message: Failed to claim the daily reward.

badges_idle_apps.description: Shown on your badges page, can also be translated as apps with drops or games with cards

badges_idle_apps_on_this_page.message: Apps to idle on this page: $amount$
badges_idle_apps_on_this_page.description: Shown on your badges page, can also be translated as apps with drops or games with cards

badges_idle_drops.description: Shown on your badges page, can also be translated as cards remaining

badges_idle_drops_on_this_page.description: Shown on your badges page, can also be translated as cards remaining

achievement_global_unlock.description: Do not add percent symbol, it will be formatted automatically

achievements_groups_by_steamhunters.message: Achievement groups are provided by Steam Hunters via SteamDB.
achievements_groups_by_steamhunters.description: Steam Hunters is the name of https://steamhunters.com/ please do not translate it

inventory_list_at_title.message:
Lists the item for lowest listed sell price

Displayed price is the money you receive (without fees)

inventory_sell_at_title.message:
Lists the item for highest listed buy order price

Displayed price is the money you receive (without fees)

spoilers_reveal.description: A button or checkbox that reveals spoilers when toggled

options_welcome_description.message: Review the options below and toggle the ones you prefer. To get back here in the future:

options_review.message: Leave a review for this extension

options_permissions_description.message: This extension requires additional permissions to work correctly on SteamDB, Steam Store, and Steam Community.

options_footer1.message: Made with üíô by SteamDB folks.

options_footer2.message: It's open source, thanks to all the contributors!

options_website_explanation1.message: When this option is enabled, the extension will request some user data (wishlisted, owned, followed, ignored products, and products in cart) from the Steam store and will use these to apply highlights on the site.

options_website_explanation2.message: You have to be logged in on the store for this to work.

options_website_explanation3.message: This is contained entirely within your browser and is never sent even to SteamDB backend.

options_website_explanation4.message: To prevent excessive requests to the Steam Store, your user data is cached in your browser's local storage.

options_website_highlight.message: Highlight owned and wished products on $domain$

options_website_highlight1.message: Wishlist, follow, and ignore products on the Steam store directly from SteamDB

options_website_highlight2.message: Enable the free packages script

options_website_highlight3.message: Enable extra filtering on sales page and bundles page

options_website_family.message: Highlight family owned apps (requires an extra request)

options_extra_data_players.message: When the "$options_online_stats$" or "$options_steamdb_last_update$" option are enabled, the extension will do a secure request to $domain$ to get the current amount of players and last game update.

options_extra_data_prices.message: When the "$options_steamdb_lowest_price$" option is enabled, the extension will do a secure request to $domain$ with your currency (with what Steam thinks it is) to get the recorded price for a specific game.

options_extra_data_achievement_groups.message: When the "$options_achievement_groups$" option is enabled, the extension will do a secure request to $domain$ to do achievement grouping on personal achievements page with data provided by Steam Hunters.
options_extra_data_achievement_groups.description: Steam Hunters is the name of https://steamhunters.com/ please do not translate it

options_steamdb_lowest_price.message: Display the lowest recorded price on product pages

options_online_stats.message: Display current concurrent players and max peaks on product pages

options_steamdb_last_update.message: Display last update on product pages

options_button_app.message: Display a button on product pages

options_button_pcgw.message: Display PCGamingWiki button on product pages

options_button_sub.message: Display a button on package pages

options_button_gamehub.message: Display a button on community hubs

options_button_gamecards.message: Display SteamDB and store page buttons on game cards page

options_link_subid.message: Display SubID under each purchase option

options_link_accountpage.message: Link each package on your licenses page

options_profile_calculator.message: Add a calculator link on community profiles

options_enhancement_inventory_sidebar.message: Move game selection on inventory page to the side

options_link_inventory.message: Link each gift and coupon in your inventory to SteamDB

options_link_inventory_gift_subid.message: Correctly figure out gift SubID in your inventory

options_enhancement_inventory_no_sell_re.message: Do not refresh the inventory when selling an item

options_enhancement_inventory_badge_info.message: Display badge level on trading cards and booster packs

options_display_market_price_others.message: Display item market price in other users' inventories

options_enhancement_tradeoffer_no_gift_c.message: Suppress "this trade appears suspicious" and "are you sure this is a gift?" trade offer alerts

options_enhancement_tradeoffer_better_er.message: Display better error messages, instead of Valve's cryptic error numbers

options_enhancement_skip_agecheck_descri.message: Sets age and birthday cookies to always pass

options_enhancement_no_linkfilter.message: Remove "You are leaving Steam" link filter from external sites
options_enhancement_no_linkfilter.description:: "You are leaving Steam" should match what the button on Steam itself says: https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=https://steamdb.info

options_enhancement_market_ssa.message: Accept Subscriber Agreement on market, inventory, and activate key pages automatically

options_enhancement_hide_install_button.message: Hide "Install Steam" button in header and product pages
options_enhancement_hide_install_button.description:: "Install Steam" should match what the button on Steam itself in the header says: https://store.steampowered.com/

options_steamdb_rating.message: Display SteamDB rating on product pages

options_enhancement_appicon.message: Display product icon on store and community pages
options_enhancement_appicon.description: The icon is displayed to the left of the game name

options_achievement_groups.message: Group achievements with data from Steam Hunters
options_achievement_groups.description: Steam Hunters is the name of https://steamhunters.com/ please do not translate it

options_spoiler_achievements.message: Put hidden achievements behind a spoiler element

options_prevent_store_images.message: Stop images from loading on product pages

options_prevent_store_images_description.message: Some developers put megabytes of images in product descriptions which can take a while to load, click on an image to load

options_enhancement_award_popup_url.message: Support $award$ parameters on profile and shared file links

options_builtin_collapse_library.message: Add a button to collapse the "already in your library" block

options_builtin_card_drops.message: Display total amount of card drops remaining on badges page

options_builtin_queue_cheat.message: Add a button to automatically discover the queue during sales

options_builtin_multibuy_redirect.message: Redirect back to game cards page after buying remaining cards

options_builtin_achievements_locked.message: Display a lock icon for locked achievements

options_builtin_achievements_csrating.message: Display CS rating history on CS2 achievements page
